basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Dental Lab Technician | Digital Dentistry • Prosthetics • CAD/CAM
basics.summary: Detail-oriented Dental Lab Technician with hands-on experience in digital dentistry, CAD/CAM workflows, and the design and fabrication of dental prostheses. Skilled in operating precision equipment including 3D printers, milling machines, and inLab CAD/CAM software. Known for technical accuracy, fine motor skills, and ability to collaborate with dentists and lab staff to produce high-quality results.

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Designed and fabricated fixed and removable dental prostheses using Dentsply inLab CAD/CAM software
Operated 3D printers and milling machines with high precision to produce accurate restorations
Maintained computer systems and networked lab devices to support dental workflows
Processed and invested dentures, partials, and night guards according to prescriptions

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Led 3-person team coordinating daily clinical operations across 6 treatment rooms
Supported dentists with procedures requiring detailed knowledge of tooth anatomy
Managed equipment installs, sterilization processes, and documentation exceeding healthcare requirements
Prepared impressions, articulated models, and assisted in laboratory-related tasks

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Applied technical troubleshooting skills to maintain lab and office systems
Trained clients and staff on use of technical equipment and software
Demonstrated attention to detail in configuring systems and ensuring quality control

projects.name: Digital Dentistry Portfolio
projects.description: Hands-on experience with CAD/CAM workflows, including designing, milling, and finishing dental prosthetics. Operated 3D printers, lathes, and hand tools for investment, processing, and fabrication.
